Safegraph

Name: Replica

Name: Placer. ai
Use Case: Developers and brokers can find unique oppertunities based on highly accurate foot traffic data. Investors and developers will also find this useful in evaluating new projects.

Name: Opportunity Insights
Description: This website contains datasets which track the economic impacts of COVID-19 on people, businesses, and communities across the United States in real time.
Use Case: Brokers, investors, and developers can quickly see a high level over view of the effects of COVID and how things change moving forward, which can serve as a useful market benchmark as well as provide a better perspective on the time horizon for future deals at prior volumes

Name: Walk Score
Description: For tracking foot traffic on retail hubs
Use Case: Brokers can find foot traffic numbers for properties

Name: Rent Estimate
